headline.main: Eden Praises Norway and Poland for Faith; Sees Example for All Freedom-Loving People

lead_paragraph: LONDON, Sept. 1 -- Foreign Secretary Anthony Eden today eulogized the courage of the Norwegian and Polish peoples for their unyielding attitude in the face of the most cruel aggressions and promised them that the day was ahead when they would drive the invader from their soil.
abstract: Sec Eden lauds Polish stand against Gers, Brit Norwegian Inst s
